meanings.definition: Preconventions: existing or occurring before the establishment of conventions
meanings.sent1: The preconventions ideas were deeply rooted in tradition.
meanings.sent2: Her preconventions thoughts challenged the status quo.
meanings.sent3: The preconventions notion seemed outdated in the modern world.
meanings.sent4: His preconventions mindset paved the way for innovation.
meanings.sent5: The preconventions concept was difficult to change.

meanings.definition: Preconventions: ideas or beliefs that are formed prior to societal norms or standards
meanings.sent1: The preconventions of the ancient tribe influenced their rituals.
meanings.sent2: She held onto preconventions that no longer fit the current society.
meanings.sent3: His preconventions clashed with the new cultural trends.
meanings.sent4: The preconventions of the past shaped their worldview.
meanings.sent5: Exploring preconventions can lead to personal growth.
